content:
# The smelting process has timed out again, indicating that the stone furnace is still not able to produce iron plates despite having fuel and iron ore.
# This suggests that there may be an issue with the furnace itself or the resources being processed.

# Let's take a step back and check the furnace's status and inventory one more time to diagnose the problem.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")

# Check the status of the furnace, including any warnings.
furnace_status = stone_furnace_entity.warnings if hasattr(stone_furnace_entity, 'warnings') else []
print(f"Furnace Warnings: {furnace_status}")

# Confirm what resources are currently in the furnace and their quantities.
copper_plate_count = furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.CopperPlate, 0)
iron_ore_count = furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronOre, 0)
wood_count = furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.Wood, 0)

print(f"Current Copper Plates in Furnace: {copper_plate_count}")
print(f"Current Iron Ore in Furnace: {iron_ore_count}")
print(f"Current Wood (Fuel) in Furnace: {wood_count}")

# If the furnace has copper plates but no iron ore, it may be stuck in a state where it cannot process any further.
# I will remove any existing copper plates from the furnace to clear it out and focus on iron processing.
if copper_plate_count > 0:
    extracted_copper_plates = extract_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=copper_plate_count)

# Now, I will insert 1 iron ore into the furnace again for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=1)  # Insert 1 iron ore.

# Finally, I will wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1:  # Wait until I have at least 1 iron plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout for iron ore - please check resources.")

# After the wait, I will extract the iron plate if it has been produced.
extracted_iron_plate = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=1)

# Now I will attempt to craft the assembling machine again.
craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, quantity=1)

# Finally, check the inventory after crafting the assembling machine.
print(f"Inventory after crafting assembling machine: {inspect_inventory()}")
